column3: (file format explainer)->
column4:
Localization files are formatted like CSV so they can be easily edited,
however formatting has strict rules for easy parsing. Most of these rules
are already handled by Excel / Libre / etc., so you don't have to worry
about them in normal usage. However, if your localization file seems to
be corrupted, these rules may be helpful for debugging purposes...
- The first 4 rows can be arbitrarily long
  - The first cell of first row is used to store this block of instruction
    text
  - The first 3 cells of the fourth row is used as headers
  - All other cells in the first and fourth rows are ignored
  - Columns in the second row alternate between property and value (ex.
    ' foo | 1 | bar | 3.5 | ... '
    - Any whitespaces before and after the property name are ignored
  - Columns in the third row are exclusively comments for properties in the
    second row
- Every following line can include any number of cells, but only the
  first four will be parsed (you can use the rest as comments if needed)
  - The fourth column is an optional metadata column

column3: NonDialogueFontScale

column1: Set to 1 allow the parser to read this file, otherwise it will be skipped and the default English localization will be used as fallback
column3: Float value that scales font size of all non-dialogue text, 1.0 for full size.
column5: Float value that scales font size of all dialogue text, 1.0 for full size.
column7: The author(s) of this file, will appear in credits

column2: Orig
column3: Translation

column2: You’re awake! <var>Cat</var> has been acting... <wavy>strange.</wavy>
column3: 你醒了!<var>Cat</var>最近表现得...<wavy>很怪.</wavy>

column2: It started when <var>Cat</var> touched that Artifact you brought back.
column3: <var>Cat</var>碰了一下你带回来的那个<wavy>古遗物.</wavy>

column2: Can you check on <var>Cat</var> outside?
column3: 你能去外面看看<var>Cat</var>么?

column2: Wha- What's happening?
column3: 究...究竟在发生什么?

column2: <var>CatUpper</var> NOOO
column3: <var>CatUpper</var>!别走!!

column2: W-what is taking you away? Why??
column3: 你怎么飘起来了??

column2: Wait. Where is... everything??
column3: 等等...为什么房子周围什么也没有??

column2: Oh honey... you have to bring back <var>Cat</var>! I'll research what caused all this...
column3: 小探险家...你一定要把<var>Cat</var>找回来!我来研究这一切的原因...

column2: Oh honey... you have to bring back <var>Cat</var>! I'll research what caused all this...
column3: 小探险家...你一定要把<var>Cat</var>找回来!我来研究这一切的原因...

column2: It's even <var>Cat</var>'s birthday tomorrow.
column3: 明天甚至是<var>Cat</var>的生日.

column2: There's some global phenomenon that started last night.
column3: 昨天夜里出了件大事...

column2: Some people online have been calling it the "Cataclysm".
column3: 网上有人把它叫做"大灾变".

column2: Parts of the world are missing. Void, just like we saw outside.
column3: 世界的一大部分都[消失]了,就像我们周围这样.

column2: Do you think that maybe...? No it can't be...
column3: 你觉得会不会是...?不可能...

column2: Honey, maybe <var>Cat</var> fiddled with that Artifact you brought, and somehow caused this.
column3: 会不会是<var>Cat</var>碰了的那件遗物导致了这一切?

column2: Oh, you found a piece of the world and were able to restore it?
column3: 哦,你找到了一块能修复世界的[碎片]?

column2: Maybe... you can help fix this? Just please... be careful with that Artifact.
column3: 也许...你能用它们和你的古遗物把这一切复原?

column2: And if you can, please find <var>Cat</var>. I'm worried...
column3: 别忘了去找<var>Cat</var>.我很担心...

column2: Isn't this ol' Cathy's cat? She has a ton of cats.
column3: 这不是老凯茜的猫么?她家里有好几只猫.

column2: Oh, she might know where <var>Cat</var> is!
column3: 也许她知道<var>Cat</var>在哪里!

column2: Sigh... everything reminds me of them.
column3: 哎...我想<var>Cat</var>了.

column2: Isn't this ol' Cathy's cat? I think her three cats are out again.
column3: 这不是老凯茜的猫么?她的三只猫又跑出去了.

column2: Oh, she might know where <var>Cat</var> is!
column3: 也许她知道<var>Cat</var>在哪里!

column2: Sigh... everything reminds me of them.
column3: 哎...我想<var>Cat</var>了.

column3: 凯茜住在镇中央面包房的边上.不过你还没有找到那块碎片.

column2: Isn't this ol' Cathy's cat? I think her three cats are out again.

column2: Has anyone been feeding <var>Cat</var>?

column2: What??

column2: WHAT????
Aliens?? Took <var>Cat</var>??

column3: 外星人竟然真的存在??

column2: Juliet, my love, where hast though disappeared to?!
column3: 朱丽叶,我的爱人,你去了哪里?

column3: 朱丽叶,我的爱人,你在哪?

column2: Please bring my beloved back, lest I drink this poison!
column3: 请找回我的挚爱,不然我...服!毒!自!尽!

column2: Your cat? I care not! Where art thou, Juliet?!
column3: 谁管你的猫,我只要朱丽叶!

column2: Please bring my beloved back, lest I drink this poison!
column3: 请找回我的挚爱,不然我...服!毒!自!尽!

column2: Juliet, my beloved, where hath thou disappeared to now?
column3: 朱丽叶,我的挚爱,你为什么消失了?

column2: Oh, what a tragic life I must endure. The cycle of dread continues.

Oh Juliet! I'll
never leave
you again.

离开你!

Juliet, will you
be mine?

朱丽叶,
我们要...
在一起!

column2: hmmm...
oh! another person??

column2: something <wavy>freaky</wavy> is going on. the world's straight disappeared!
column3: 多么<wavy>奇怪</wavy>...大半个世界都[消失]了!

column2: check out this little slider thing i found. looks almost like a piece of the world
column3: 看看我找到的这这块[碎片].它看起来像是一片地图.

column2: stand clear!!
column3: 躲开!!

column2: the caves await.
column3: 洞穴在等着我探索!

column2: i heard there are more relics in there. im gonna follow the trail to the source.
column3: 我听说那里有更多的遗迹.我要找到这一切的根源!

column2: the caves await.
column3: 洞穴在等着我探索!

column3: 我的天...这里被[复原]了!你是怎么做到的??

column3: 你有没有兴趣做我的研究助理?

column2: no..? thats fine... um... the spots taken anyway...

column2: so... what about these ruins.
column3: 那么...关于这些废墟.

column2: ahA! it looks like those ruins pieces might connect!!

column2: an arrow? it must lead to a relic!
column3: 箭头?它一定指向古遗物!

column2: how do i get there?
column3: 我要怎么过去?

column2: this way? no...
column3: 这边?不...

column2: over here?
column3: 那边?

column2: aHh im so lost! everything keeps moving!

column2: you! follow that arrow!
column3: 你!跟着那个箭头!

column2: now these glyphs... we just need to find the final fragment.
column3: 这些符号...还差[最后一个印记].

column2: my research assistant was looking for it last. no idea where he is now...
column3: 我的研究助理不知道跑到哪里去了...

column2: you found chad?? tell him to bring me the final fragment already
column3: 你找到了大碴??让他把最后部分拿过来.

column2: tyy! now let me take a look...
column3: 蟹蟹~让我看一看...

column2: wOAH! everything is shakingggg
column3: 哇!好像在<wavy>地震</wavy>!!

column2: aMAZING! did you see that?!

column2: we need to <wavy>fix the village</wavy>!
column3: 我们得<wavy>修复这个小镇</wavy>!

column2: wow, everythings in the right place again, just like i remembered!
column3: 哇~全部回归原位了,就像我记得那样.

column2: i think im onto something, explorer. these glyphs are related to whatever broke up the world.
column3: 我有头绪了,探险家.这些印记和破坏世界的那个东西一定有关联~

column2: there's more in the caves up north. you should come!!
column3: 北边的洞穴里一定有更多的线索.你也该去看看!!

column2: oh, make sure to grab a map from the Mayor first!

column2: Not so fast squirt!
column3: 小*崽子!

column2: Get me some coffee first, damn youngin. I left it at the beach...

column2: Not so fast squirt!
column3: 小*崽子!

column2: Would you leave me alone already!?

column2: Leave me alone, kid.
column3: 爱干嘛干嘛去吧.

column2: Help! My buoys have gotten tangled up. Mind untanglin' them for me?
column3: 帮帮我!我的[浮标]缠住了.能帮我解开么?

column2: Thanks a bundle! I don't have much, but you can have this strange junk I fished up.
column3: 谢谢!我手头啥也没有...你要不要我刚吊上来的这块纸片?

column2: I'm heading to the beach soon. Rumor is there are new fish in the water.
column3: 我马上启程去[沙滩]那边了,留言说那里鱼很多!

column2: Was gonna hit the ocean soon, but my boating license expired.
column3: 我本来想出航的...结果一看驾照过期了.

column2: You've got your license! Hurry on now, let's set sail!
column3: 你原来有驾照?我们赶快启航!

column2: My lover, my darling! Please bring him back lest I stab myself!

Oh Romeo! You 
will never

sight again.

你再不会
离开我的视线了.

Yes, oh
my God, yes!

好,
哦上帝啊,太好了.

column2: Somethin's wrong. The fish aren't coming upstream anymore. I'll be out of a job!
column3: 不知道为什么,上游的鱼全没了...我要失业了!

column2: I could really use a fish right now, fish right now.
column3: 要是有鱼就好了...有鱼就好了...

column2: Ah, the ocean! If only I knew how to fish the open seas.
column3: 啊,大海!可惜我不知道怎么在海上钓鱼...

column2: But alas, I can only fish the river by the waterfall.
column3: 我只知道怎么在瀑布边上钓鱼.

column2: The river's together... is there a traffic jam downstream?
column3: 河道拼齐了...难道下游堵车了?

column2: Something fishy is going on here...
The fish are coming back! Time to whip out the old pole.
column3: 太好了,上游的鱼回来了.开钓!

column2: Heard there was one in the caves, but also pirates. Scary!
column3:
听说洞穴那边有一张,但是那边有一帮海盗.我不敢过去...
译者注:滑块世界的设定里驾照并不记名,只要捡到"一张"就能用.

column2: Good luck out there, say hi to <var>Cat</var>.
column3: 祝好运!代我向<var>Cat</var>问好.

column2: I'm going back to fishing the river.
column3: 我要回河边钓鱼了.

column2: Hey there! Have you seen what's been going on lately?
column3: 嘿!你清楚最近出什么事了么?

column2: Chunks of land missing everywhere, and these little slider pieces popping out of the ground!
column3: 大片大片的陆地消失了,还有这些小纸片不知道从哪里冒了出来.

column2: They've all been resurfacing ever since the earthquake last night.
column3: 它们是昨晚的地震之后冒出来的.

column2: I'm not sure how to make sense of it. Maybe I should go digging for them!
column3: 它们背后难道有什么线索?也许我应该多挖一些出来.

column2: Oh! Where'd you find that? That Archeologist was looking all over for that fragment.
column3: 哦!你从哪里找到的?那位考古学家找它很久了.

column2: Did you hear? The railway in the Chloro Caves was shut down.
column3: 你听说了么?水帘洞里的铁轨都不通了.

column2: Apparently the bridge was destroyed.
column3: 因为大桥断了.

column2: Those scientists must be quite heated right now...
column3: 那些科学家一定不太开心吧...

column2: Did you hear? There's fighting at the Flats down east apparently.
column3: 你听说了么?东边的平原那里最近打起仗了.

column2: Like, I've heard rumors of the military being deployed there!
column3: 从小道消息听说,连军队都出动了.

column2: I wonder if they're the ones behind all this... or whoever they're fighting.
column3: 但是他们在跟谁打呢?我没一点头绪.

column2: Out of my way! Do you know who you're talking to?
column3: 让开!你知道你在和谁说话吗~

column2: I… am Chad! And the credit for returning this fragment is mine!
column3: 我是...王!大!碴!找回这张碎片的功劳全是我的~

column2: Up here, short stuff. Ha! You can't even jump.
column3: 上来,矮个子~哈!你甚至不能按空格键跳跃!

column2: What are you gonna do? Gonna cry?
column3: 你还能怎么办?哭?

column2: Nothing can bring me down!
column3: 没有什么能把我[弄下来]!

column2: Woah, what's shaking?
column3: 哇!什么在晃?

column2: My neck! My back! How will I get this to the archeologist now?
column3: 我的脖子!我的后背!我该怎么把它还给考古学家...

column2: You better not take my credit. I worked hard to become a Research Assistant.
column3: 你最好不要冒充我的功劳.你不知道我吃了多少苦头才当上了研究助理!

column2: What? How dare you take my credit?!
column3: 什么?你竟敢...冒充我的功劳.

column2: You won't beat me again, explorer. Chad never loses twice in a row!
column3: 走着瞧,探险家...大碴...额...不会输第二次!

column2: You won't beat me again, explorer. Chad never loses twice in a row!
column3: 走着瞧,探险家...大碴...额...不会输第二次!

column2: Ah, I can finally get back to baking... and...
column3: 啊,我终于可以回到烹饪...和...

column2: Hunting for all nine of the rarest Breadge... and...
column3: 狩猎最罕见的小面堡...和...

column2: Looking for The Legendary Burger!
column3: 寻找传说中的芝士堡!

column2: Woah! You got a piece of Breadge?!
column3: 哇!你找到了一片小面堡?!

column2: Rumor says that combining all nine can make something to rival the taste of The Legendary Burger.
column3: 传言说收集齐9块可以合成传说中的芝士堡.

column2: Good luck on your quest, sous-chef!
column3: 祝你好运,我的帮厨!

column2: WoAH! ALL NINE PIECES!!
column3: 哇!全部九块!!

column2: Maybe you were The Legendary Burger the whole time...
column3: 也许你才是真正的汉堡家.

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@0:0
column2: Goodness, hello! The folks here call me Cathy.
column3: 哇,你好!我是凯茜.

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@0:1
column2: I have a bit of a connection with pets.
column3: 我很喜欢各种宠物.我与它们有一种...心灵感应!

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@0:2
column2: Your cat? <var>Cat</var>..? Let me try and sense where they are.
column3: 你的猫, <var>Cat</var>..?让我看看能不能感应到它.

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@0:3
column2: Somewhere... to the East... beyond the Ocean...
column3: 在...东方...越过大海...

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@0:4
column2: It feels like there are a number of people around <var>Cat</var>. They're being brought somewhere?
column3: <var>Cat</var>的边上似乎有...很多"活物".好像...它们正把它带到哪里?

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@0:5
column2: They're being stuffed in a bag? Thrown into the back of a truck?! Oh dear!
column3: 哦!<var>Cat</var>被装在一个袋子里...拉在一辆卡车后面?!天哪...

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@0:6
column2: Or maybe my senses are getting mixed up with what I saw on the tele last night.
column3: 额...也许我的心灵感应和昨天看的电视剧混在一起了...

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@0:7
column2: Sorry dear, I'm not of much help. Please visit whenever you need some Cathy Time though.
column3: 对不起...今天的[凯茜时间]恐怕只能到这里了.如果你改天有空,不介意再来拜访...

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@0:8
column2: Or if you find my 3 cats!
column3: 或者,如果你找到了我的三只猫猫.

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@10:0
column2: All the cats are back! Here, have some breadge as thanks.
column3: 所有猫猫都找回来了!这些[小面堡]是给你的谢礼.

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@11:0
column2: Good luck finding <var>Cat</var> and thanks for the help.
column3: 希望你也能尽快找到<var>Cat</var>.

column3: 秋天有些时候会呆在在南边的仓库里.

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@6:0
column2: Mittens like to poke around the bakery looking for food sometimes.
column3: 爪爪喜欢在面包房周围找吃的.

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@7:0
column2: Mittens! Thank you for returning him!
column3: 爪爪!谢谢你找回它.

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@8:0
column2: Autumn! Thank you for returning her!
column3: 秋天!谢谢你找回它.

column1: Map/Village 8Puzzle/STile (9)/All Tile Maps/House Tile Maps/Decorations/Small House/Cathy@9:0
column2: Tofu! Thank you for returning him!
column3: 豆腐!谢谢你找回它.

column2: Thanks for everything, partner. Please, take a map from my house.
column3: 太感谢了,朋友.别忘了从我家拿一张地图.

column2: Heard the fishermen east and archeologist up north are still lookin' for help.
column3: 东边的渔夫和北边的考古学家还需要些帮助.

column2: Licensed, eh? Be careful with that thing.
column3: 驾照?额...小心点吧.

column2: You've done a good thing, partner.
column3: 你办了件好事,朋友.

column2: Boating license required.
column3: 严禁无证驾船.

column2: Operation Log 4: Objective Success.
column3: 任务日志4:任务成功.

column2: We have captured the specimen and are returning to main base beyond the Ocean.
column3: 已得到标本.正在越过海洋区域,返回大本营.

column2:
Stonybrook Village's tourist hot spot: 
"The Face Rocks"
column3:
石头镇的旅游景点:
"人面石"

column2: I need to get to the waterfall, it’s mating season!
column3: 正是交配的季节,我需要到瀑布那里!

column2: I need to get to the waterfall, it’s mating season!
column3: 正是交配的季节,我需要到瀑布那里!

column2: But... it's so far... I can't wait to get going.
column3: 但是...瀑布离这里太远,我来不及了...

column2: It's so close! I can't swim on land, though.
column3: 瀑布就在边上!可惜我不能游过地面...

column2: If I could swim up the river I could make it.
column3: 如果我能逆流而上,就能到了!

column2: No time to lose, gotta blast!
column3: 没时间了,马上出发!

column2: The wife thanks you as well, by the way.
column3: 哦对了,我老婆也很感谢你.

column2: The Archeologist is missing, huh.
column3: 考古学家不见了...

column2: I guess I'll have to do her job.
column3: 我们替她把工作做完~

column2: The ruins... you got a connection!
column3: 遗迹...有道理!

column2: Woah! The diviner still works.
column3: 哇!这个指针还能工作.

column2: Now... Just find the final part to this spell.
column3: 法术只差最后一部分了~

column2: Great! Now let me cast it...
column3: 好!让我~施法~~~

column2: Fuwaaaaaaaaaa!
column3: 呀啊啊啊啊啊!

column2: There! Now use The Artifact to reconnect the village.
column3: 成了~现在用遗物重新把镇子连起来!

column2: There! Now use The Artifact to <wavy>reconnect the village.</wavy>
column3: 成了~现在用遗物重新把镇子<wavy>连起来</wavy>!

column2: Great! I'll be heading out now, take care.
column3: 我先走了,拜拜~

column3: <Tab>键使用遗物

column2: Use the mouse to move sliders
column3: 鼠标点击以移动滑块

column3: <Action>键对话

column2: Press <Action> to pick up items
column3: <Action>键拾取
